      • backbone

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> backbone(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> varibales)
        Description copied from interface: PBSolver
        Verifies if the passed variables are either true or false for all satisfying assignments. Returns +id for each true assignments and -id for each false assignment in the resulting set. In general, the resulting set contains fewer elements than the input set because some variables are not yet statically assigned.
        Specified by:
        backbone in interface PBSolver
        Parameters:
        varibales - The indices of the variables to examine.
        Returns:
        Those variables that are statically assigned and their assignment.
